span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vt. 激活，加强： to make effective or active, or more effective or more active
【例】 additives to potentiate the drug 增强药效的添加剂
【近】 activate, energize, enhance, intensify, stir, wake, vitalize
【反】 deactivate 使无效；abate, attenuate, dwindle, lessen, moderate, reduce 减弱，削弱

【记】 potent强有力的 + ate动词
